Package cmput301f13t10.view

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DeleteSectionDialogFragment.DeleteSectionDialogListener
    The activity that creates an instance of this dialog fragment must implement this interface in order to receive event callbacks.
    SectionChoiceDialogFragment.AddChoiceDialogListener
    The activity that creates an instance of this dialog fragment must implement this interface in order to receive event callbacks.
    SectionView
    Interface for section views.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdventureArrayAdapter
    Adapter for the library
    AdventureEditView
    A view that displays an adventure's sections, allows the adventure title to be changed, allows sections to be deleted and created, and provides navigation to the adventures different sections.
    ContinueDialogFragment
    A dialog box that contains a list of choices for the user to pick when deciding how to continue in the story.
    DeleteSectionDialogFragment
    A dialog box that allows the user to confirm deletion of a section.
    LibraryEditView
    This is an activity that displays a list of adventures to the user.
    LibraryView
    This is an activity that displays a list of adventures to the user.
    MainActivity
    The main menu of the app.
    SectionArrayAdapter
    An adapter for the adventure edit view that makes list items with a text view and a delete button.
    SectionChoiceArrayAdapter
    Displays section choices in a list view
    SectionChoiceDialogFragment
    The dislog to add choice descriptions to a existing or new section
    SectionEditView
    This is the view of a section it can have images or text added to it it can also navigate to the modify choices menu and back to the adventure edit view
    SectionModifyChoicesView
    This is the activity that allows a user to change which choices the current section is linked to
    SectionReadView
    View that allows the user to read and navigate an adventure.
    SimpleSectionArrayAdapter
    Simply displays sections titles
